name: TheDivineMercyChaplet
0:
”Alexa, open divine mercy chaplet”
”Alexa, ask divine mercy chaplet for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start divine mercy chaplet”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: divine mercy chaplet
des: Pray The Chaplet of The Divine Mercy with Father Michael Gaitley, MIC. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
